Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: no tea and coffee facilities in the room this should be provided as a minimum loud club noise on the Saturday night which went on until about 3 4 in the morning
Positive_Review: Staff were super friendly and helpful faultless pool and bar area were really great

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: The location is far from the city though it should not concern the visitors as the subway station is not far It is our second stay in this hotel and we see that the check in process is very problematic People are waiting quite long to get checked in and it does not look a very efficient way of working
Positive_Review: Nice hotel with good access to nearby shopping mall and metro station Rooms are clean and decorated fairly It is not too far to the public beach as well

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: I stayed in a suit and There is not a separate lighting switch for the bed room That was a bit annoying at night The music coming from the very nearby arena was sometimes annoying at night and I wished the hotel windows have a better isolation like the ones I have in my apartment which is in a tower in a very busy area in Dubai
Positive_Review: It is very clear the hotel is relatively new comparing to the hotels in the city center

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: The hotel blocked 1500 Euro in my credit card two days after I have left the hotel I paid 1500 Euro for my room at the check in day Money is still blocked

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: Wi fi was kind of slow otherwise was very good
Positive_Review: A great hotel for Barcelona especially when you have your room on the 22nd floor last one with a great of the city and the sea We had the one with the view of the city you can see Sagrada and the hills and all the adjacent places They ve got a Bar and a Pool on the 13th floor which was very cool Very good staff clean rooms big bathroom with double shower Very close to the beach 10 minutes easy walking distance Enjoyed it

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: No instructions for the TV in the room and was not set to an English speaking channel Not enough towels provided in the bathroom No tea making facilities in the bedroom
Positive_Review: Breakfasts were good although we had not realised they were NOT included in the booking price

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: the only minor issue was that the air conditioning temperature could not be adjusted in the room only the fan speed and getting out of bed in the morning was a bit cold not under the blankets But nothing excessive
Positive_Review: The hotel was exremely quiet and I appreciated it very much as I had a tough day and needed rest The bed was comfortable room and bathroom were spacious enough the staff very friendly and helpful Bar by the pool has a great view the breakfast buffet offered quite a broad range of food including fresh fruit milkshakes which I thought was great Will definitely return

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: This is more of a nice boutiquehotel which also fitted our little family me my wife and a 3 year old little boy We really appreciated the nice lobby the food was outstanding in the restaurant and the little pool worked well for us However for older kids it might be a little boring On the other hand there were only some 300 meters to the nice beach with a small taverna

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: Small pool area not enough sun beds Cocktails were expensive and no special offers on drinks Room cards were extremely temperamental both for the rooms and lifts
Positive_Review: Good location opposite Diaganol shopping mall ten minute walk to the beach and nearest metro Hotel receptionists were friendly and helpful both daytime and nighttime staff

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: Rather small rooms with no balcony Breakfast for extra money order eggs and you ll pay even extra free wifi is very slow and overall poor value price ratio
Positive_Review: Perfect location if going to CCIB The hotel has all facilities including fitness swimming pool at the 13th floor Magnificent view from the pool Very friendly staff

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: my luggage was lost at check out they found out later where it was pool wasnt clean at all couldnt find my booking at check in even though i had a confirmation number in general value vs quality poor
Positive_Review: room was great

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: Not a complain about the hotel but on the first night there was a beach party with fireworks going well into the night If you know there s gonna there on a beach party night ask to be on the city view side instead of on the beach side
Positive_Review: All the staff I ve interacted with have been exceptionally kind patient and helpful Fast elevators

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: No tea or coffee in the room would of been lovely to Jst be able to make a cup of tea coffee when I wanted one
Positive_Review: Staff were lovely and very helpful

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: Location was a bit far out from centre but probably appropriate for a beach holiday
Positive_Review: Hotel pool is beautiful but a little small Bar and views from there pretty awesome

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: the ocean side view was not so great the room itself was a bit outdated especially when compared to the bar and pool area I felt that I was paying a bit much for the location and room but I did book only 2 days before so I m not sure what sort of deal I would ve found had I booked sooner
Positive_Review: facility was great the pool was beautiful and the bar next to it was fantastic

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: I love having a coffee tea service in the room and would have appreciated having that in my room
Positive_Review: The property was very convenient to the Convention Center and the room was very quiet Breakfasts were good but the setting was rather dark The paper bathmats are an excellent idea

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: The Hotel Location is very fanatstic in front of the seaside and just eays and quick to take the Diagonal Mar to go to City Center The Hotel has a very goodlooking swinning pool at floor 13 and just by the Swimming pool there is agood bar very good the Drinks iin the evening The breakfast area it is at 4 floor and the cakes and Croissant are very good Enjoy your staying

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: No negatives from me
Positive_Review: Staff were very helpful and friendly Room was lovely and clean Ten minute walk to the beach and easy transport links to the centre of Barcelona made it a perfect location for our needs

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: Should have been informed beforehand that there would be a feria and funfair very close to the hotel for this weekend We found it very difficult to sleep as it was so noisy until 03 00am Booking com should have supplied this information
Positive_Review: Staff were extremely nice

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: There wasn t anything we didn t like but a suggestion would be to have tea and coffee facilities in the room please
Positive_Review: The photo s displayed were exactly as the hotel is From the moment we entered the foyer a receptionist called Raquel helped us check in also giving us plenty of information we asked for she was a pure delight so very helpful pleasant and friendly in fact all the staff were lovely

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: No information in the room about Barcelona you could ask the staff but it would have been nice to have been able to read brochures etc in the room No hotel information in the room
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: Such old and terrible beds and mattresses do not exist even in the cheapest hostels A shame Hotel is a vacation rest in the hotel is primarily a bed If you can not provide such a service do not call yourself a hotel
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: The pool was not temperature controlled and was freezing to the point that no guests could enjoy it not even children Was not expecting that at all so very disappointing
Positive_Review: Staff were helpful in assisting with me ordering a pizza to the hotel

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The hotel was very comfortable and clean Location is great for beach and also close to local transport to city Breakfast is brilliant with lots of choice The room was very spacious

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: Its a shame the pool is not heated The food was good but not a huge choice on the menu very much bar snacks which did surprise me but it s Barcelona and there s a million places to eat anyway
Positive_Review: really comfy beds nice sea view friendly staff amazing rooftop views good location for bus tours but a little set back from the main areas of the city you might want to visit if travelling for sightseeing

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: Free internet connection can be further enhanced improvised better speed
Positive_Review: Great hotel facility Super helpful and welcoming reception staffs Accessible via various public transportation mode Great view of Barcelona from the east

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: The pool was too cold and no iron in the room
Positive_Review: The family room was large spacious and very comfortable Staff helpful and courteous Pool bar beautiful Area excellent lots of restaurants shops and minutes from the metro We loved the hotel

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: Far from the Center Room is quite small for the price and the name No English channels except news Sea view is not a beach view Paid WiFi
Positive_Review: Friendly and helpful staff

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: The staff at the front desk gave us wrong information about the opening times of the mall The music in the bar on the 13th floor is too loud and not great The Gym should not be that cold
Positive_Review: Great location Great rooms and great room service very clean Connection to city metro etc is perfect

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: No robes or slippers in the bathroom but you can purchase them at the reception Wi fi is free only in public areas if you want it in your room you have to pay and the rates aren t cheapest ones
Positive_Review: Brilliant locations The suit bar offer excellent view to city and Mediterranean Sea Staff is friendly and helpful

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: WiFi is free only in the lobby in rooms one has to pay for it some ridiculous money Check in process is very slow so there is always a long line even though all check in desks were open Sound insulation could be better
Positive_Review: Clean room with nice view to the see

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: The bed is squicking the floor is with no carpet which can be slippery and cold since the room sandals are not provided
Positive_Review: The location of the hotel is perfect There is a huge mall across the hotel the tramp stop is 1 minute away and the hop on hop off bus stop is right in front of the hotel building

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: If you have light sleep Noisy on the street side if you keep the Windows open but also on the sea side view where there is noise of internal water pipes or other strange recurrent noise
Positive_Review: The terrace and restaurant at 13 floor very nice

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: The unfriendliness of the receptionist at check in when my credit card was declined even though I have since used it successfully
Positive_Review: Selection of food at the breakfast bar

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: Very noisy bedrooms Poor sound proofing No tea coffee facilities in the bedrooms Expensive breakfast
Positive_Review: Comfortable rooms Very clean Close to all transport links

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: Free WiFi available in the rooms as well as communal areas
Positive_Review: Good breakfast choices selection There was always a good range of food and drink available including Cava for the truly decadent

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: Check in time Awful We arrived at 10 and we entered our room at 3 10
Positive_Review: Nice location rather away from center Beautiful lobby ok rooms Busy hotel with impatient staff

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: Everything was up to my standard for sure
Positive_Review: I liked the fact the hotel was a bit out of the city center because of the busyness Metro bus and hopOnhopOff bus are right in front nearby so no logistical issue for me Beach accessibility 5 min walk so great as well Sunrise from my window and a nice surprise in the bathroom very cute

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: The swimming pool was disappointing overall very small and water is too cold
Positive_Review: The location is good close to beach in front of the shopping mall and many place to eat drink in walking distance The view from the hotel was nice sea view

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: Reception staff were rude and need better training The hotel charged me for the room then also preauthorised my card for the room again and extra charges My colleague and I did not want to charge anything to the room anyway and made them aware of that before they have done it I was left with no money for my trip i used the phone at reception to contact my bank and I was concerned about my account being negative to which they said it was the hotel Receptionist had the cheek to ask me how much longer I ll take on the phone then claimed that the bank is lying and they don t owe me any money She was useless and basically said the nights team will deal with it and just let me walk away without anything being unsolved The hotel blocked my card with this amount for over 2 weeks Once I have posted a bad review that s when they suddenly knew how to speed up this process and finally returned my money
Positive_Review: The hotel was in a good location The pool area was fab and it looked stunning at night Bar staff were all very helpful and friendly

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: Too small standard room and small double bed Surprised they put small bed in the room to put chairs and table which occupy to much space in this tiny room usually in Marriott hotels they use kingsize bed It wasn t really comfortable to sleep together for single traveller should be good enough Small window doesn t add feeling of comfort Glass door to bathroom doesn t allow to keep sounds inside bathroom so you partner need to be prepared Shower head was broken and was quickly changed by request Cleanliness was not good dust in cabinet hairs in tube and so on Surprised they have only about 8 sunbeds at roof pool Whenever you come there is no available sunbeds There are enough space to put 10 more but for some reason AC Hotel doesn t did that Strange People sitting on chairs and even sofas after pool so sofas getting wet They also failed to do simple thing at check in to block amount on credit card Instead of that they charged deposit on the card and then at check out issued refund Since my card in another currency I ve got currency exchange related costs Sleepers is not included and offered for sale at reception Free water bottles only at arrival day and not renewed daily
Positive_Review: Great breakfast as one may expect in Marriot chain hotel Located near llevant beach Metro station is in walking distance Provided free internet access as Marriott elite member

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: The loud party outside some kind of rave or something kept us up till 3 30am 2 nights in a row Walls are very thin you could hear neighbours clearly My daughters airplane pillow went missing after the room was cleaned and the hotel really didn t seem to care
Positive_Review: The hotel as beautiful and clean and in a great location close to the beach and a big mall

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: Would have been nice to have coffee tea making in room or in lobby
Positive_Review: great breakfast buffet Bar area and outdoor pool very pleasant Evening meals had of potential but fell a little short not in presentation but in preparation Rooms were comfortable with good internet access and toiletries room safe and minibar Conveniently located and great ocean view Staff were excellent friendly and very helpful

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: Could have provided a cordless kettle for our own purpose to boil water It s difficult to every now then to go to the bar level 13 request for boiling hot water
Positive_Review: Everything else seems fine

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: The rooms didnt have any equipments to make tea or coffee the main restuarant was closed during the month of August
Positive_Review: Location next to public transport and shopping mall

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: Just I dident like the breakfast regulation about paying for fried egg or omlet I think it isnot good for a hotel with this quality class Any way so thanks
Positive_Review: The hotel design view was nice I liked it if i go to Barcelona again I will booke that again

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: The breakfast was supposed to cost 21 per person When we arrived they informed us that there was a special offer for 13 per person We were a family of 7 traveling from all around Europe to meet in Barcelona and booked 3 different rooms They informed us that check in time was 3 p m We asked if it was possible to have one room earlier so that kids could rest They informed us that the personnel had a break at that time 12 a m and the room could be ready at 2 We returned at 2 50 p m Asked our rooms only to be informed that they were not ready We complained and the answer was that they could not guarantee the exact time of check in In 2 minutes the room was ready Small pool 13 floor beautiful view Away from anything difficult metro system serious safety issue our suite had a beautiful shower but the light bulbs were not insulated ip 50 but regular spot lights
Positive_Review: Beautiful view to the sea modern lobby friendly staff thank you Hazel nice clean room Opposite to a big mall

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: I wish i knew the metro layout of Barcelona beforehand but the hotel itself was superb
Positive_Review: The concierge and reception staff are brilliant Breakfast and bed were lovely and the rooftop bar was ideal Excellent will definitely stay here again

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: Air conditioning was not acceptable I was repeatedly bitten by mosquitoes in the room And was dreading going to bed at night
Positive_Review: Quick and easy check in

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: Just a warning make sure you get a room without the connecting door between rooms Too much noise and not sound proof from guests next door
Positive_Review: Nice that I was able to move rooms from the first room I had Also room with sea view was very nice

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: In the toilet there was no toilet brush and no exhaust system and the door consists of Glass ane was not closeable There were no items for wet clothing and beach towels so they couldn t get dry In Barcelona the peple didn t eat breakfast like we do so you need a hotel with breakfast which we didn t know So we took extra breakfast as we noticed and it was so expensive 22 per day I would recommend to order breakfast when you arrive because they offer it for 13 per day and the next day you ask for you pay 22
Positive_Review: The hotel is located very central The tourist bus station was in front of the Hotel also a big shopping center diagonal del mar where you can eat delecious and buy cheap water Every day we got new fresh towels

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: we had a problem with towel refill For some reason some towels were always missing For city center you need a 10 taxi but the i wouldn t change the site city center was too busy and hot to stay
Positive_Review: The lobby design was fantastic modern and classy The view was great

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: 1 Dirt the most dirty hotel room I ve ever seen hairs and stains in the bath stains on duvet cover etc see photos I ve notified staff of this situation but niobody did anything about it 2 Ocean view in fact this is a factory view sea is quite far from the hotel 3 Value for money old and dirty room the hotel itself is situated quite far from the city center
Positive_Review: friendly staff big room with a beautiful bath quite good breakfasts

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: Doors not opened normally something quite disturbing From the first day we found that cleanliness is superficial In the bathroom under the sink and in the bathroom corners it was a huge layer of dust that was not removed during whole stay see picture Bedside table were not deleted from dust and also the window sill see picture After a week I specifically asked to change my bed sheets because there were not changed from the beginning of stay which is unacceptable in terms of hygienic
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: The was some issues when we first checked in with he room being ready but once we got past that everything else was great Coffee machine in the Breakfast floor was very ordinary for good coffee visit the Floor 13
Positive_Review: The location was great a Hop on Hop off stop right outside the lobby a shopping centre across the road and a museum next door I highly recommend the Pool Restaurant Area

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: Poolside could have had more sunbeds as they were always taken when we got there Would have liked to have seen the pool stay open till later in the evening sometimes would have liked a late evening swim Mojitas were very expensive at 13 each
Positive_Review: Good to have a pool

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: Complementary water should be 4 bottles on daily basis at the family room No coffee machine in the family room No night shift fast setup for the rooms Rooms only clean once a day
Positive_Review: Location Nice family room Daily complementary snack and water Good breakfast varity A very helpful staff at the front desk always smiling

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: It s a little far out if you have come to sightsee but it suited us for an overnight stay before leaving Barcelona by car
Positive_Review: We chose the hotel for an overnight stop after hiring a car from the airport It s easy to find and the parking is in the basement of the hotel The hotel is modern with a rooftop pool and bar The Mare gin tonics were fantastic There is a shopping Mall opposite and it s a short walk to the nearest metro stop which is on the yellow line for easy reach of the city centre

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: price of breakfast but you can easily visit the shopping mall with cafes across the road Slightly too far from centre around 12 13 euro taxi ride one way in to Picasso Museum
Positive_Review: The pool deck and bar area was great fantastic views of the city Cocktails great Room facilities lovely

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: My room was a little scruffy and looked like it needed updating some broken furniture and not quite in keeping with how beautifully decorated the bar area was But the room was absolutely spotless and I can t fault how well stocked the bathroom was Considering we didn t spend too much time there it was great fir what we needed We had a few bits from the pool bar menu and weren t impressed but you can t please everyone
Positive_Review: Breakfast was amazing a great start to the day and definitely something for everyone It felt very special to have a Buck s Fizz with my eggs in the morning Our room junior suite was a great size for two adults and two children great double shower yes two showers saved time when getting ready for morning or evening time The staff were really lovely very friendly and knew lots about the area They even helped improve my children s Spanish The bar area is beautifully decorated muted tones and Scandinavia inspired furniture It s a shame that they don t have dinner served there only pool bar menu

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: Bed was uncomfortable and the WiFi was inconsistent
Positive_Review: A well presented hotel located just off the main beach road highway with great access to public transport opposite a bus stop for Barcelona Bus Turistic and with only 5 10 minute walk across the road to the beach

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: The cleaning was not done thouroughly Front office staff did not deliver the best customer care Check in and out was ok nothing special Came to this hotel for a special occasion and staff did not make me feel special
Positive_Review: Decor location and Brand Came for a special occasion

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: The beds were very bad not n relation with a 4star hotel The service is very poor We wanted to reduce the amount of days from 8 to 4 days because some other plans came up which they never accepted as it was none changeable dates fair As I mentioned to them you probably think the hotel doesn t want to loose money ok but in the end the hotel will loose money in the future because I will never come back and I will certainly not recommend it to my network So that is the price for not being flexible and trying to make us happy Moreover the staff never says hi to you Never asked us how was our stay or if we needed a taxi They are just ignoring you every possible way and we noticed this applied to all guests I think that the hotel needs more leadership Another bad example was the lack of towels at the pool We were informed that the practice of having towels available at the pool was cancelled the week before is this really a 4 star hotel
Positive_Review: Location was good

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Very convenient pool is not sufficiently equipped for size of the hotel Very friendly and helpful staff for Barcelona Would be great to be able to make your own coffee in the room and not wait for room service

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: Breakfast presentation could be improved Some dishes were cold even they were fresh The air conditioning is too strong too cold everywhere in the hotel
Positive_Review: Staff were very prompt and nice The location is very good great views of the sea or and city Very convenient in terms of transport links restaurants and shopping mall right accross the street

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: I have booked 2 rooms and asked for a double bed but they haven t secured that During check in we were given two rooms in different floors both were king bed And one of the rooms had another guests in them We were outraged of the situation went in to the staff and they have apologized and upgraded one of our rooms to a suite for the rest of our stay however this was an unpleasant experience to have
Positive_Review: The price The cleanliness The compensation that the gave

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: The staff did not smile much the room was not serviced propley only had three pillows for the two of us Did not fill up the the bathroom shampoos and forgot to give us hand towels twice Too many people in the pool area trying to find the sun always very busy Thought food and drink was expensive
Positive_Review: It was just ok

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: The perfume used in the elevators lobby is way to intense The breakfast was expensive for what it has to offer
Positive_Review: Nice and modern hotel right at the Forum Rooms were spacious and comfortable The restaurant bar offers a view over the city of Barcelona very nice

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: The exercise facility was lacking Also the pool closed at 8 00 pm so my kids didn t get to use it The waiter told us the first night it closed at 9 00 pm so we went the next day to use it at 7 45 and were informed that the first guy was wrong
Positive_Review: It was right across the street from a mall so great variety of stores with good prices and lots of places to eat Also right next to a small museum free for kids and only 2 50 for adults and a 10 minute walk from a beach one of the least crowded ones there

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: Some furniture items were chipped and you can see wear and tear on edges etc The hotel should inspect furniture items for damages and replace to keep its stars status Front desk staff need to be more welcoming and smiley looked stressed and miserable
Positive_Review: Location and bed comfort

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: Have to pay for wifi in the room Was given twin room when specifically asked for double told that no doubles were available Was not informed of this till arrival Asked 3 different staff for change but heard nothing back When eventually spoke with manager a room became available No tea coffee facilities in room Only 6 sunbeds available around small pool which is looked over by office block
Positive_Review: Very clean food and drink nice in bar View from 17th floor room very good over city or sea Close to Metro beach

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: The gym was very dated It wasn t as big as I thought it would be
Positive_Review: Endrick Rachel and Lisa were AWESOME It is the stsff that make this ordinary hotel so g reat 0 Bfeak breakfast was a special event every day It was fantastic There was so much Choice it is well worth it

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Breakfast was excellent WiFi was very good Rooms were comfortable and spacious Had a beautiful view of the ocean Great staff and fantastic service Nice location across the street from a nice mall and not far from train station

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: not much everything was catered for
Positive_Review: i loved the 13th floor pool looking out onto the beach and also to the city nice to take some time out after a day in the city up here

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: There was a festival over the road from the hotel This was not the hotels fault however the music was so loud at 2am that it made the hotel shake our own fault for booking the holiday whilst the festival was going on The hotel was quite out of the way from the main bars restaurant would need to take a metro or cab to go into the main city
Positive_Review: The view from the pool was amazing All staff were friendly and so helpful especially reception staff

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: So many flaws though minor that undermine what could be a good hotel
Positive_Review: The 13th floor space had a nice corner with a great city view Had a major issue with the bed in the room rather like a cot bed that creaked at every movement supervisor resolved it quickly with move to another room

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: No free wifi in the bedrooms Pool was tiny Pool terrace too windy to really enjoy
Positive_Review: Good choice at breakfast Small shop on ground floor selling water and open 24 hours

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: The attitude of the staff was disgraceful I wrote them several emails and phone them without receiving a response I asked them to consider my situation am using crutches by they didnt care Overall I was very dissapointed
Positive_Review: Great location Nice hotel Nice facilities

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: The only very small issue was the timing for having the room cleaned I was at a music festival that ran until 6AM each night I didn t really feel like waking up at noon just to vacate the room to have the sheet changed
Positive_Review: Location was perfect as I was attending Primavera Sound at the Parc del Forum Free WiFi was a big help

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: the view it s not very nice and the parking it s kind of complicated if you have a big car
Positive_Review: We spent a very good time at this hotel Staff is super nice and it very easy to go everywhere by public transportation It situated right in front of a nice mall with area for kids and restaurants

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: We could hear everything from the next room there is no sound proofing at all in room 1811 Listened to long conference calls all hours from next door On the last nights we had to listen to a huge fun fair that opened in front of the hotel loud noise until 03 00 On top of the noise the room and bed were super small Service is efficient but careless unable to book a restaurant for us no umbrella when it rained No kettle in the room to make tea
Positive_Review: This seaside hotel is located close to the CCIB convention center the Forum metro and the hop on hop off bus stops outside The location is great if you are going to the convention center Clean room and hotel and nice to be able to open the window to get fresh sea air Taxi stop right outside

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: Some more extras in the room like cotton buds and de makeup pads
